name: HKLiveWorkoutDataSource
desc: A data source that automatically provides live data from an active workout session.

items.name: init(healthStore: HKHealthStore, workoutConfiguration: HKWorkoutConfiguration?)
items.desc: Creates a new data source based on the provided workout configuration.

items.name: var typesToCollect: Set<HKQuantityType>
items.desc: The quantity type samples that the data source automatically sends to the workout builder.

items.name: func enableCollection(for: HKQuantityType, predicate: NSPredicate?)
items.desc: Begins automatically calculating statistics for samples that match the quantity type and predicate.

items.name: func disableCollection(for: HKQuantityType)
items.desc: Stops automatically calculating statistics for the quantity type.
